attributes.action: Allow A Petition On Banning The Burka In The UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Search for a petition to ban the wearing of burkas in the UK and you will find several. Sadly, they are all filed in the "rejected" tab.

Let us have our say on this degrading, intimidating and in many cases unwelcome headwear.

Sign below simply to be ALLOWED a petition and let our Government see how strongly we feel about this.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
